quoteText: If You cease using Discogs Services, You confirm that Discogs is entitled to continue using Your user-generated content and may continue display Your user name along with Your content pursuant to the rights granted above.
title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.

tosdr.case: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
tosdr.tldr:
The Discogs ToS state under "LICENSING OF USER CONTENT":
"If You cease using Discogs Services, You confirm that Discogs is entitled to continue using Your user-generated content and may continue display Your user name along with Your content pursuant to the rights granted above."
